message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer reflects the true value of this product.  Could we consider $900,000? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $875,000?
